ModMetaData.name: Power Alerts
ModMetaData.author: diddily
ModMetaData.description: Adds alerts for when your power grid needs attention, including: Disconnected generators, batteries close to being empty, buildings at risk of short circuit and fueled generators almost out of fuel. Configuratable options included. Dependencies This mod depends on Hugslib. Load order should be: Hugslib -> Power Alerts.
